ASR with a taxonomy tree

All branch lengths are a unit

Source: vignettes/articles/asr-taxonomy.Rmd
asr-taxonomy.Rmd
library(taxPPro)
library(bugphyzz)
library(ete3r) # https://github.com/sdgamboa/ete3r
library(phytools)
library(ape)
library(dplyr)
library(tidytree)
library(ggtree)
library(tidyr)

Attribute with categorical/logical values

Import data 

select_cols <- c(
    "NCBI_ID", "Attribute", "Evidence", "Frequency", "Rank", 
    "Taxon_name"
)

oxygen <- physiologies("aerophilicity")[[1]] |> 
    resolve_agreements() |> 
    resolve_conflicts() |> 
    select(all_of(select_cols)) |> 
    filter(!is.na(NCBI_ID), !is.na(Rank))
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Warning: 345 conflicts couldn't be solved. Dropping them.

glimpse(oxygen)
#> Rows: 8,701
#> Columns: 6
#> $ NCBI_ID    <int> 442869, 291967, 291968, 329726, 258514, 1427378, 31980, 358…
#> $ Attribute  <chr> "obligately aerobic", "aerobic", "aerobic", "aerobic", "obl…
#> $ Evidence   <chr> "exp", "exp", "unknown", "unknown", "exp", "exp", "exp", "e…
#> $ Frequency  <chr> "always", "always", "always", "always", "always", "always",…
#> $ Rank       <chr> "genus", "genus", "species", "strain", "genus", "genus", "g…
#> $ Taxon_name <chr> "Acanthopleuribacter", "Acaricomes", "Acaricomes phytoseiul…

Filter by rank 

oxygen_strain <- oxygen[oxygen$Rank == "strain",]
head(oxygen_strain)
#>    NCBI_ID               Attribute Evidence Frequency   Rank
#> 4   329726                 aerobic  unknown    always strain
#> 25  574087               anaerobic  unknown    always strain
#> 29  441768 facultatively anaerobic  unknown    always strain
#> 43  762376                 aerobic  unknown    always strain
#> 47  591001               anaerobic  unknown    always strain
#> 49  933801 facultatively anaerobic  unknown    always strain
#>                              Taxon_name
#> 4        Acaryochloris marina MBIC11017
#> 25    Acetohalobium arabaticum DSM 5501
#> 29         Acholeplasma laidlawii PG-8A
#> 43        Achromobacter xylosoxidans A8
#> 47 Acidaminococcus fermentans DSM 20731
#> 49              Acidianus hospitalis W1

Get taxonomy tree for selected NCBI_IDs 

tree_ox_strain_data <- getTree(unique(oxygen_strain$NCBI_ID))
tree_ox_strain <- tree_ox_strain_data@phylo
tree_ox_strain
#> 
#> Phylogenetic tree with 1197 tips and 1196 internal nodes.
#> 
#> Tip labels:
#>   309798, 445932, 653733, 309799, 515635, 572547, ...
#> Node labels:
#>   , 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...
#> 
#> Rooted; includes branch lengths.

The metadata of the nodes is also present:

my_tree_metadata <- tree_ox_strain_data %>% 
    as_tibble()
head(my_tree_metadata)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 8
#>   parent  node branch.length label  name   rank   sci_name                 taxid
#>    <int> <int>         <dbl> <chr>  <chr>  <chr>  <chr>                    <dbl>
#> 1   1213     1             1 309798 309798 strain Coprothermobacter_prot… 309798
#> 2   1213     2             1 445932 445932 strain Elusimicrobium_minutum… 445932
#> 3   1212     3             1 653733 653733 strain Desulfurispirillum_ind… 653733
#> 4   1214     4             1 309799 309799 strain Dictyoglomus_thermophi… 309799
#> 5   1214     5             1 515635 515635 strain Dictyoglomus_turgidum_… 515635
#> 6   1215     6             1 572547 572547 strain Aminobacterium_colombi… 572547

The tree must be rooted and fully solved (dicotomies only):

is.rooted(tree_ox_strain)
#> [1] TRUE
is.binary(tree_ox_strain)
#> [1] TRUE

Step 4. Create a 1-0 matrix for each attribute (discrete) 

attribute_matrix <- oxygen_strain |> 
    mutate(Presence = 1) |> 
    select(NCBI_ID, Attribute, Presence) |> 
    pivot_wider(
        names_from = 'Attribute', values_from = 'Presence', values_fill = 0
    ) |> 
    distinct() |> 
    tibble::column_to_rownames(var = 'NCBI_ID') |> 
    as.data.frame() |> 
    as.matrix()
attribute_matrix[1:5, 1:5]
#>        aerobic anaerobic facultatively anaerobic microaerophilic
#> 329726       1         0                       0               0
#> 574087       0         1                       0               0
#> 441768       0         0                       1               0
#> 762376       1         0                       0               0
#> 591001       0         1                       0               0
#>        obligately anaerobic
#> 329726                    0
#> 574087                    0
#> 441768                    0
#> 762376                    0
#> 591001                    0

Divide matrix into vectors 

states <- vector("list", ncol(attribute_matrix))
names(states) <- colnames(attribute_matrix)
for (i in seq_along(states)) {
    states[[i]] <- attribute_matrix[,i]
}
states <- states[vapply(states, \(y) sum(y) > 1, logical(1))]
states <- lapply(states, function(x) {
    output <- as.character(x)
    names(output) <- names(x)
    output
    })

states <- states[vapply(states, \(y) length(y) > 1 , logical(1))]
lapply(states, head)
#> $aerobic
#> 329726 574087 441768 762376 591001 933801 
#>    "1"    "0"    "0"    "1"    "0"    "0" 
#> 
#> $anaerobic
#> 329726 574087 441768 762376 591001 933801 
#>    "0"    "1"    "0"    "0"    "1"    "0" 
#> 
#> $`facultatively anaerobic`
#> 329726 574087 441768 762376 591001 933801 
#>    "0"    "0"    "1"    "0"    "0"    "1" 
#> 
#> $microaerophilic
#> 329726 574087 441768 762376 591001 933801 
#>    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0" 
#> 
#> $`obligately anaerobic`
#> 329726 574087 441768 762376 591001 933801 
#>    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0" 
#> 
#> $`obligately aerobic`
#> 329726 574087 441768 762376 591001 933801 
#>    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0"    "0"

Estimate ASR and convert likelihoods in entries

These two steps are performed with a single function call:

x <- createEntriesASR(x = states, phy = tree_ox_strain, df = my_tree_metadata)
head(x)
#>          NCBI_ID        Taxon_name Attribute Evidence Frequency         Rank
#> 1199           2          Bacteria   aerobic      asr    rarely superkingdom
#> 1220      204434 Acidobacteriaceae   aerobic      asr   usually       family
#> 1226...3   32069       Aquificales   aerobic      asr sometimes        order
#> 1227       64898      Aquificaceae   aerobic      asr   usually       family
#> 1240      203692      Spirochaetia   aerobic      asr    rarely        class
#> 1244         171        Leptospira   aerobic      asr   usually        genus
